description:
Exposed-brick renovated studio with true NYC Character, located in Upper East Side, just steps from transportation, bars, restaurants, supermarkets, trendy shop and touristic sights (Roosevelt Island, Central Park, 5th avenue, Time Square, United Nations…).
Very clean,  safe, cosy and organized studio with full kitchen and bathroom and lots of closet space. Extra twin bed available on top of a queen sized bed.
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers,families and business travelers.

everything you see you can access.

Upper east side: lots of bars, restaurants, shop and sight seeing. Very close to central park, and 5th avenue (15 min walk).

8 min walk from 4,5,6,N,R,Q,W,F trains. 15 min walk to M and E trains. 1 station away from Grand Central Station.
name: Cozy Studio, Amazing Location
review: Great stay, location is so convenient and Alireza was very friendly and accommodating! Would recommend!
